content: around decrease round 4 *k1 p1* around work decrease rounds 1-4 another four five six times you should have 24 sts remaining decrease round 5 *s1-k2tog-psso k3 remove marker* around 16 sts remaining cut the yarn thread it through the remaining sts and weave in all ends block the hat allowing it to dry by laying it flat on a foam mat after blocking if desired attach a pompom to give the hat a slouchier look and enjoy thank you for supporting my work pattern support feel free to reach out to me with any questions about my patterns i m happy to help ravelry moemr social media want to see sneak peaks of upcoming designs follow me on ig instagram @moemr01 auckland bound pg 3 © 2022 maddy moe
